Contents:

- Integrated updates up to 2014.11
- Integrated Internet Explorer 11
- Integrated .NET 4.5.1
- Updated DirectX
- Versions 32bit to install:
  STARTER, HOMEBASIC, HOMEPREMIUM, PROFESSIONAL, ULTIMATE
- Versions 64bit to install:
  HOMEBASIC, HOMEPREMIUM, PROFESSIONAL, ULTIMATE
- You can install with your original key


Instruction:

Size ISO: 5,74 GB (bytes: 6Ã‚Â 173Ã‚Â 296Ã‚Â 640)
SHA1 ISO: 9ff9292f272ee7299e33fc82a0e8b2df7dca3a25

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD9) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootable USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=ntfs quick
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activation - read info in activation.txt

Others:
UEFI Boot is not supported in AIO.
Recovery mode is x86 - 32bit (must be 32bit in AIO). If you want to install in UEFI mode, download a separate version x64 - 64bit.


System settings unchanged. Integrated via Slipstream&Sysprep. Mastering via scripts (DISM, IMAGEX, OSCDIMG, CMD)
